def arr2bin(arr):
    return all(type(n) == int for n in arr) and format(sum(arr), 'b')

def arr2bin(arr):
    return False if any(type(e) != int for e in arr) else bin(sum(arr))[2:]

def arr2bin(arr):
    return all(isinstance(n, int) and not isinstance(n, bool) for n in arr) and bin(sum(n for n in arr))[2:]
